001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.bitcoind;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.RpcConfig;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.RpcURI;
006
007import java.net.URI;
008import java.net.URISyntaxException;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010
011/**
012 * Bitcoin configuration from bitcoin.conf
013 * First cut is just a map, but future versions may be strongly typed
014 */
015public class BitcoinConf extends HashMap<String, String> {
016    public final String rpcconnect = "rpconnect";
017    public final String rpcport = "rpcport";
018    public final String RPCCONNECT_DEFAULT = "localhost";
019    public final String RPCPORT_DEFAULT = Integer.toString(RpcURI.RPCPORT_MAINNET);
020
021    /**
022     *  Create a BitcoinConf with a default RPCConfig configuration.
023     */
024    public BitcoinConf() {
025        super();
026        this.put(rpcconnect, RPCCONNECT_DEFAULT);
027        this.put(rpcport, RPCPORT_DEFAULT);
028    }
029
030    public RpcConfig getRPCConfig() {
031        URI uri;
032        try {
033            uri = new URI("http://" + get(rpcconnect) + ":" + get(rpcport));
034        } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
035            uri = RpcURI.getDefaultMainNetURI(); // TODO: Throw exception on failure, rather than fall back to default
036        }
037        String netWorkId = getNetworkId();
038
039        RpcConfig config = new RpcConfig(netWorkId, uri, get("rpcuser"), get("rpcpassword"));
040        return config;
041    }
042
043    private String getNetworkId() {
044        String isTestNetString = get("testnet");
045        String isRegTestString = get("regtest");
046        boolean isTestNet = (isTestNetString != null && isTestNetString.equals("1"));
047        boolean isRegTest = (isRegTestString != null && isRegTestString.equals("1"));
048
049        if (isRegTest && isTestNet) {
050            throw new RuntimeException("Invalid config file, both 'testnet' and 'regtest' are set!");
051        }
052
053        if (isRegTest) {
054            return BitcoinNetwork.ID_REGTEST;
055        } else if (isTestNet) {
056            return BitcoinNetwork.ID_TESTNET;
057        } else {
058            return BitcoinNetwork.ID_MAINNET;
059        }
060    }
061}
